channel.title: CVE Feed for Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries -- all products

item.description: Electronic Delivery Check System (Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries The Agriculture and Rural Development Project Version) March, Heisei 31 era edition Ver.14.0.001.002 and earlier improperly restricts XML external entity references (XXE). By processing a specially crafted XML file, arbitrary files on the system may be read by an attacker.
